name: Angry captain
description:
Yo-ho-ho, Captain ! ! !

Why aren't you in the mood again? Did your team throw you out again because of the wrath of the birds? I don't understand why you hate birds. It's good that your team gave you at least a sword. Good luck in your adventure with your anger.

How to move:

  * Use the [Right key] and the [Left key] to walk. 

  * Use the [Up key] to jump. 

  * Use [Space] to attack.

Credits:

Ivan Miziuk - coder and music

Mary Miziuk - artist

Vasyl Miziuk - sound designer
